message:
KCR Garu and I met & extensively reviewed the drought & water scarcity situation in Telangana. 

Talked about using space technology to identify blocked water channels, which can then be targeted for desiltation via public participation.

Details on Mission Kakatiya, to rejuvenate water tanks & waters storage structures & progress in micro-irrigation were shared by KCR Garu. CM KCR also briefed me on Mission Bhagiratha, which aims to provide safe drinking water to rural households. http://pmindia.gov.in/en/news_updates/pm-reviews-drought-and-water-scarcity-situation-at-high-level-meeting-with-telangana-cm/?comment=disable
